name: 戴楠青
objective:
模擬輔助設計之基礎在於如何操作數位輔助工具的模擬準確性，與了解不同設計階段所需之不同層次的模擬真實性。本課程將針對空間的尺度，進行永續與節能等物理性質，與視覺與空間感知等感官性質進行模擬輔助設計。目的即在訓練學生如何在不同的設計階段能有效利用數位工具來做正確評估，並作為設計決定的適當依據。
The aim of this course is to introduce computer simulation tools to evaluate various performances of different design solutions. The core concept of this course is to modularize each computational technique with its theory and applications and interrelate them to form a network; and to develop the ability to integrate different modularized digital techniques into an efficient and effective workflow for a particular demand.
